value.title: New Sharing Experience for Power BI Reports
value.excerpt: During this session, I’m going to talk about new Sharing capabilities launched by Microsoft this month. Now, we can share reports via the link using this new sharing experience. Earlier with the older experience, we were only able to provide direct access to the report. Now, with this new sharing experience

value.title: New way to compare Date and DateTime Value in Power BI - August 2021 Feature Summary
value.excerpt: Welcome to one more new update from Power BI Desktop. Sometimes we need to compare date or DateTime value in our DAX expression. At that time, we are using Date() function and Time() function. Now, there's one more easy way to compare Date and Time value in Power BI which is using "dt" keyword before

value.title: New way to Upload File from Power BI Workspace
value.excerpt: In this short video, let's talk about new way to upload files from Power BI Workspace. In the workspace you want to add files to, you’ll see an Upload option next to the New button. You’ll be able to use this dropdown to connect to files stored in OneDrive for Business or any SharePoint site you have

value.title: Power BI Admins Gain My Workspace Access
value.excerpt: During this video, we will check how Power BI Admins can get User's My Workspace Access. Power BI provides secure storage for user data in their "My Workspaces". value.title: Power Query Tip - Add Sequential Number using the Index Column in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, we will learn, how we can easily add the sequence for the rows using the PowerQuery. In Power Query we can add the sequence number using the Index.
